name: Another Random Space Shooter
description:
Concept:

You can read it from the title, yes this is another one of those space invader game. And yes it's actually very simple. Just avoid the enemies with your arrow keys until the COUNT DOWN is over. No big deal, there are only 5 levels with repeated content and linearly increasing difficulty. But oh, I wish it is that simple. Even I the creator have never finished until the last level. So please, don't really take it to the heart if it's too hard. Have fun!

Oh btw, see that nuke counter on the upper left? That's for whole screen wipe out EXPLOSION! But you can only use it ONCE per level. And it's only get triggered when you get hit. So basically it's your life. And also your ability. But I guess it's not really important after all. For the last time, have fun!

*pro tip: Don't get too close to the edges

Control:
Use arrow keys to move the ship
Hold shift to slow down
